: : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
Rodimus embraced Nightlight tightly, and rubbed the tears from her eyes.
Rodimus Prime: I know it's dangerous and most likely a trap, but I have to go. Optimus was my mentor. It's because of him that I am who I am today. I have to meet with him and try to help him. I owe him that much. You dont worry. I'm, comeing back from this mission. I'll be back with you and Elita soon. I love you both.
Rodimus kisses Nightlight for what, although a short period, seemed like an eternity.
He started to leave when Kup stoped him.
Kup: What about the plague, lad?
Rodimus Prime: Wheeljack's work. I'll see him before leaving.
Rodimus heads quickly to Wheeljack.
Rodimus Prime: Jackie, I need the antidote right now. I have to go meet Optimus.
While Roddy is waiting he picks up his conversation with Cam.
Rodimus Prime: Hello, Cam. I am Rodimus. I understand that these cubes are dangerous and cause "big booms." I can see why your parents told you to keep them safe. Please try to understand this is a special time. The sickness is here and those cubes could help all of us. We'll take special care not to cause any "big booms" with them. I promise.
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Nightlight:

Nightlight heard the message and said anxiously "Will you go 
ROdimus?" she huged him tightly and said while hey eyes where full 
with tears "Don't go, my love, it could be a tramp!!! If Prime 
changed as you told me.. then he might wish kill you... Think in 
your daughter... Please... it's dangerous... don't leave us... Plus 
the Plague is outside... you can't reach him without get the 
plague..."





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
> OOC:taking back Hydras
>  Hydras stood up. His wings spread and fiore exploded from his 
veins. "He is 
> cold, I can feel his dark energy, ah yesss Prime I'll meet you." 
he opened his 
> comm, "I'll be there Prime, I'll be there." He looked around. "You 
all stay 
> here, I shall be back." He opened the hatch. He knew hed be in 
danger of the 
> rust plague but he didnt care this was much for imporant. He 
transformed into 
> his two headed dragon beast mode and flew to the coordinates.
> > 
> > (I'll put a profile up as soon as I have a name and 
password...hint...hint hint)
> > 
> >  
> > 
> > Optimus Prime:
> > 
> >  
> > 
> >              In his protoform body, Optimus Prime glided his 
stolen ship easily 
> > through the void of temporal space. He was heading to Earth to 
visit some 
> > friends. Not knowing what he would find when he got there, he 
decided he would 
> > need a suitable vehicle mode. He found one in the ships 
databanks. A 
> > Cybertronian tanker, complete with the ability to lift off.
> > 
> >             As he cleared Temp Space he started the scan of the 
truck, every 
> > little detail. Then downloaded the information into himself. He 
got up from his 
> > chair, built for the old Autobots and Decpticons, and went to 
prepare. As he 
> > incorporated the designs into himself he thought of all the 
people on this 
> > planet. He was ready.
> > 
> >             He touched his chest, the change to actual bot had 
hurt his combined 
> > Spark. Prime was shocked as he entered the atmosphere.
> > 
> >             In the deep Prime voice that had once declared to 
Megatron that "one 
> > shall stand; one shall fall" he boomed, "Magnus would dare 
betray me like that?" 
> > He didn't even sit down as he entered the atmosphere, the ship 
shook. He was 
> > searching for the bomb that he knew Magnus had planted on the 
ship. "Oh, crap."
> > 
> >             The ship's thrusters exploded, but the rest of the 
ship didn't. 
> > Instead, it careened out of control and slammed into the ground, 
throwing Prime 
> > out of the hatch. He slid across the ground as his ship stopped.
> > 
> >             When he stopped and got up he checked himself over. 
He was in full 
> > operation, just his good looks were damaged. He walked back to 
the ship to look. 
> > He was in bad shape, his face had been ripped apart, and the 
visor over his 
> > ocular systems. Now everyone could see the protoform underneath, 
the red eye 
> > that turned and looked. His faceplate was smashed and dented, 
and his 
> > "windshield" chest was broken, so one could see the shoulder 
joints on the > inside. All in all he looked like some sort of robot 
sent back from the future, 
> > to change the future. His arm was a bit ripped up too, but he 
could live with 
> > that.
> > 
> >             Luckily for him, the communications boxes on these 
pods were nearly 
> > indestructible. He would need it to talk to the other bots. 
First though was 
> > Rodimus and Hydra.
> > 
> >             "Rodimus Prime," he started, with disgust, "and the 
one known as 
> > Hydra. I have a message for you. Magnus is dead. He was killed 
trying to stop 
> > me. But he was unsuccessful. I am requesting a meeting with both 
of you, at 
> > these coordinates. [Punches in coordinates] Know that if you 
decide to betray my 
> > trust and come with soldiers, I will kill all of you. I will 
know�"
> > 
> >             With that he cut off the transmission and waited, 
checking over his 
> > guns�.
> > 
> > 
> >

<P align=center>Rodimus kisses Nightlight for what, although a short period, seemed like an eternity.
